JDS.patterns.composite

Interface IComposite<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Superinterfaces:
    IElement<T>, java.lang.Iterable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IGraphNode<T,A>, ITreeNode<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompositeElement, GraphNode, TreeNode, WeightedGraphNode

    public interface IComposite<T>
extends IElement<T>, java.lang.Iterable
    base interface for Composite elements
    Author:
    Jacopo_Wolf

      • getAllRecursive

        static <A,O extends IElement<A>> void getAllRecursive(IComposite root,
                                                      java.util.Collection<O> out)
        recursively returns all connected elements of root, checking for reference to already inderted elements.
        Type Parameters:
        A - the content of the elements
        O - the IElement type of the out list
        Parameters:
        root - the root element
        out - the Collection to wich add the elements

      • getAllRecursive

        static <A,O extends IElement<A>> void getAllRecursive(IComposite<A> root,
                                                      java.util.Collection<O> out,
                                                      boolean checkStackOverflow)
                                               throws java.lang.StackOverflowError
        recursively returns all sub elements of root, checking for reference to already inderted elements only when specified. if checkStackOverflow if false, the algorithm will be faster, but it doesn't guarantee error-free execution. This means if the structure is not well constructed, this might generate a StackOverflowError.
        Type Parameters:
        A - the content of the elements
        O - the IElement type of the out list
        Parameters:
        root - the root element
        out - the Collection to wich add the elements
        checkStackOverflow -
        Throws:
        java.lang.StackOverflowError
